Desc.eng: Excellent! The Soul Shelter is now fully recharged. I'm safe for a few more centuries.
Can we do something to set you free?
Could such a barbaric, monster-hunting brute such as you reinvent Atlantean High Magic?
Time to leave this stuck up painting, Katarina.
Alas, I have unlocked a hidden compartment for your services. Farewell, Lady Wraith!
